dialogue.content: My sleep has been pretty messy lately.
What's the main issue-falling asleep, staying asleep, or waking too early?
Falling asleep. I feel wired even when I'm tired.
What does the last hour before bed usually look like?
I scroll on my phone, and I often have coffee mid-afternoon to push through work.
Got it. Do you want a strict routine or something realistic you can repeat?
Realistic. I won't stick to anything complicated.
Okay-then we'll keep changes small and consistent.
If I could be asleep by around 11:30 without fighting it, that would be huge.
